personality.name: JEALOUS
personality.desc: So deep do they love that they cannot stand to share the object of their affection.

personality.name: LACKADAISICAL
personality.desc: Listless & unenthusiastic. Nothing interests them enough to motivate them.

personality.name: MISCHIEVOUS
personality.desc: Puckish, even fiendish. A trickster who loves to mislead & confound others.

personality.name: ARTISTE
personality.desc: A talented/natural artist, can paint and draw very well.

personality.name: POET
personality.desc: A talented/natural wordsmith, competent in both verse and prose.

personality.name: VIRTUOSO
personality.desc: A talented/natural musician, can play one or more instruments and write music.

personality.name: ART LOVER
personality.desc: Loves to look at art and has refined taste.

personality.name: BOOKWORM
personality.desc: Reads quicker & comprehends better than most, likes being around by books and usually has one with them.

personality.name: ART HATER
personality.desc: Hates art, doesn't like talking about or being around it. May not understand art, or find it pretentious.

personality.name: GREEN THUMB
personality.desc: Likes to grow things. Grows higher-quality things & can grow in bad conditions. May talk to plants.

personality.name: HANDY
personality.desc: Good at modifying and repairing things, especially machines.

personality.name: FORGETFUL
personality.desc: May forget tasks even as they do them, seguing seamlessly into something else.

personality.name: DREAMER
personality.desc: A fanciful aesthetic combined with a good imagination. Leads a rich inner life.

personality.name: ATHLETIC
personality.desc: Likes Sports & Exercise. Annoyed by complaints about physical activity.

personality.name: GOURMET
personality.desc: Likes cooking & eating. A superior cook, can figure out recipes just by eating something.

personality.name: KLEPTOMANIAC
personality.desc: Compulsively swipes things; may return them anonymously. Practice makes them a skilled thief.

personality.name: VEHICLE NUT
personality.desc: Loves vehicles; can work on & drive anything, or talk about them ad nauseum.

personality.name: DANCER
personality.desc: Good at dancing and loves to do it. May be formally trained, a professional, or just a skilled amateur.

personality.name: ELOQUENT
personality.desc: Silver-Tongued. Have knack for prose & verse. Like to use big words and usually have a large vocabulary.

personality.name: FRUGAL
personality.desc: Good at fiduciary matters. Never spends money when it's not necessary, and regrets when it is.

personality.name: VENGEFUL
personality.desc: Easy to offend/insult. Holds grudges forever and always tries to repay them.

personality.name: TEMPESTUOUS
personality.desc: Mood shifts rapidly. Will be wild in anger or sorrow.

personality.name: HIGH STRUNG
personality.desc: Gets stressed from working. Needs support of friends to function, & bonds with those who humor them.

personality.name: EXCITABLE
personality.desc: Get psyched from doing even the most basic things.

personality.name: IMPULSIVE
personality.desc: Doesn't think through decisions, acts on whims. Desires & Fears often arbitrary or contradictory.

personality.name: RECKLESS
personality.desc: Does not recognize when a situation is dangerous or simply feels no fear about it. Doesn't back off a challenge.

personality.name: BRAVE
personality.desc: Faces and defeats their fears. Never panics, even in a crisis. Can and will Fight if challenged.

personality.name: COWARD
personality.desc: Fears the dark. Will flee scary situations. Vulnerable to bullies, and they know it.

personality.name: ANXIOUS
personality.desc: Never gets upset, just anxious. May freak out even under minimal stress, becoming serene afterward.

personality.name: NEUROTIC
personality.desc: Paranoid. Gets anxious about random things & must "check" them. May have conspiracy theories.

personality.name: NEAT
personality.desc: Likes to clean & keep things tidy. Cleans when nervous. Obsesses over hygiene; wont use dirty objects.

personality.name: SLOB
personality.desc: Unaffected & may even prefer them dirty surroundings; Hates to clean. Will eat spoiled or burnt food.

personality.name: BULLY
personality.desc: Comfortable with coercion. An expert at finding and exploiting other's fears & weaknesses.

personality.name: HUMBLE
personality.desc: Never brags or offers their unsolicited opinion, regardless of their actual self-regard.

personality.name: TALKS TO SELF
personality.desc: ...and enjoys the conversation.

personality.name: LUCKY
personality.desc: Less likely to suffer negative events/more likely to enjoy positive events. May wake up "Feeling Lucky".

personality.name: CLUMSY
personality.desc: Get tripped up, drops things, breaks things, accidently starts fires, occasionally injures themselves.

personality.name: LOUNGER
personality.desc: Not really lazy, just likes to be relaxed & sedentary. Likes passive forms of entertainment.

personality.name: HYDROPHOBE
personality.desc: Wont swim or soak voluntarily & doesn't enjoy bathing.

personality.name: CHARISMATIC
personality.desc: Likable. Bonds with others quickly. Superior conversationalist and is more convincing.

personality.name: UNCOMMITED
personality.desc: Hates commitment; frets if they have any. Will change their situation if they feel cooped-up.

personality.name: AWED
personality.desc: Can be impressed by almost anything. Though humble, they are very responsive to boasting and hyperbole.

personality.name: CASSANOVA
personality.desc: Inclined to romance & skilled at it. Turns relationships romantic easily. A casual flirt & good kisser.

personality.name: GENIUS
personality.desc: Fascinated by new things and ideas. Learns formal systems quickly & better at using them.

personality.name: ABSENT-MINDED
personality.desc: Circumstances just slip their mind, and they frequently fail to account for the needs of others.

personality.name: LOGICAL
personality.desc: likes games of logic, probably competent in mathematics or sciences.

personality.name: BRILLIANT
personality.desc: Can illuminate or baffle non-geniuses with deep ideas. Above-average teachers.

personality.name: CRAZY
personality.desc: Prone to illogical behavior. Dresses oddly. Amusing. Occasionally says something disturbing.

personality.name: OBLIVIOUS
personality.desc: Often ignores their surroundings, disregards the weather. Oblivious to danger, so comes off as fearless.

personality.name: FRIENDLY
personality.desc: Good at friendly interactions & makes friends quickly. Wants to befriend everyone.

personality.name: FUNNY
personality.desc: Always finds the humor in situations. Good at amusing others & makes friends easily.

personality.name: OBSERVANT
personality.desc: Notices & takes note of things more than others. A good listener.

personality.name: AMBITIOUS
personality.desc: Concerned with advancing in life, and good at achieving it. Gets stressed between promotions.

personality.name: DAREDEVIL
personality.desc: Adrenaline addict. Can make any activity "Extreme". Good at avoiding & recovering from injury.

personality.name: FIENDISH
personality.desc: Delighted by other's frustration & misfortune. Good at picking and prolonging fights/arguments.

personality.name: FAMILIAL
personality.desc: Better at socializing with family. Enjoys taking care of young ones & teaching the basics of life.

personality.name: HOT-HEADED
personality.desc: Gets angry rather than sad or uncomfortable. May break stuff in rage, or take it out on others.

personality.name: OUTDOORSY
personality.desc: "One With Nature". Gets cabin fever if inside for too long. Inclined to fishing and gardening.

personality.name: SENSITIVE
personality.desc: Empathetic. Feels emotions more strongly than others. Associated with CRYBABY.

personality.name: PERFECTIONIST
personality.desc: Takes longer, but does superior work. Aware of own flaws, and those of other's (and can point them out).

personality.name: LUDDITE
personality.desc: Hates/Fears technology. Espouses superiority of "Simple" & "Natural" living.

personality.name: VEGETARIAN
personality.desc: Healthy. Becomes nauseous around meat or blood.

personality.name: WORKAHOLIC
personality.desc: Successful in the workplace. Not stressed by working. Hates missing work. May take their work home.

personality.name: GLOOMY
personality.desc: Depressive. Gets sad rather than angry. Won't boast or enthuse. May scream in fury when frustrated.

personality.name: BITCHY
personality.desc: Irritable & grouchy. Like to nag and complain. Happy to spread their discontent to others.

personality.name: ROMANTIC
personality.desc: Wants Love. Enjoys Love stories. Good at building & repairing romantic relationships.

personality.name: INAPPROPRIATE
personality.desc: Doesn't recognize/care about social context. Some find them offensive, some are just amused.

personality.name: LONER
personality.desc: Likes to be alone & rarely needs socialization. Hates crowds & company.

personality.name: LOSER
personality.desc: Unsuccessful at life in general and competitions especially.

personality.name: CRYBABY
personality.desc: Sensitive and prone to tears of joy & sorrow. May cry for no reason. Can "Cry on Shoulder" if unhappy.

personality.name: BASTARD
personality.desc: A spiteful hater. Good at finding ways to hurt & irritate others.

personality.name: MOOCH
personality.desc: A parasite. Good at ingratiating themselves to others in order to use their stuff.

personality.name: SERIOUS
personality.desc: No sense of humor. May get angry when subjected to jokey people.

personality.name: SCHMOOZER
personality.desc: Skilled at self-advancement through befriending peers & sucking up to superiors.

personality.name: UNROMANTIC
personality.desc: Unromantic. Rejects romantic advances.

personality.name: CHILDISH
personality.desc: Enjoys playing with toys. Needs more fun than others & gets bored quickly. May have an imaginary friend.

personality.name: SHY
personality.desc: Uncomfortable around strangers, prefers to be alone. Dislikes attention. Has a hard time making friends.

personality.name: VAIN
personality.desc: High self-regard. Gloats often. Loves compliments. Grooms carefully, & frequently checks appearance.

personality.name: INTREPID
personality.desc: Love to travel, explore, discover, and try new things.

personality.name: ARDENT
personality.desc: Passionate/Glowing. Believes hard & fights hard for beliefs.

personality.name: ARGUMENTATIVE
personality.desc: Enjoys fighting/arguing and usually wins.

personality.name: COCKY
personality.desc: Has an overdeveloped sense of own capabilities & advertises that fact.

personality.name: INNOCENT
personality.desc: Unexperienced with the world, and usually optimistic to the point of naivet�.

personality.name: CRITICAL
personality.desc: Acutely aware of both their own flaws, and those of others. Retaliates with deconstruction when vexed.

personality.name: CRAFTY
personality.desc: Cunning. Skilled with deceit & comfortable with using it. Street-Smart.

personality.name: CLEVER
personality.desc: Resourceful & Inventive. A problem-solver.

personality.name: DISTRACTABLE
personality.desc: Has trouble focusing on tasks for extended periods, especially boring tasks.

personality.name: FOCUSED
personality.desc: Attentive, diligent, & industrious.

personality.name: ARROGANT
personality.desc: Haughty with knowledge of own skills & knowledge.

personality.name: INSECURE
personality.desc: Not comfortable with self. Lacks confidence in own abilities.

personality.name: IRREVERENT
personality.desc: Places no value of manners, respect, or the Social Contract. Speaks candidly & damn the consequences.

personality.name: POLITE
personality.desc: Respectful & courteous. Minds their manners.

personality.name: INTROVERT
personality.desc: Focused on own mind, feelings, desires, and fears.

personality.name: EXTROVERT
personality.desc: Outgoing and sociable. Primarily concerned with the affairs of others.

personality.name: BOSSY
personality.desc: Assumes leadership of any group they're part of, badgering others to defer.

personality.name: COOPERATIVE
personality.desc: Good at working in groups. Shares responsibilities & credit equitably.

personality.name: EASYGOING
personality.desc: Doesn't mind changing plans & goals to suit the needs of others. Unconcerned with success.

personality.name: INTRACTABLE
personality.desc: Stubborn to the point of obsessive. Will never admit to being wrong, or even consider it possible.

personality.name: SEDENTARY
personality.desc: Doesn't like to move, preferring to lounge around & relax.

personality.name: AFFECTIONATE
personality.desc: Openly expresses affection for people around them and is never ashamed or embarrassed.

personality.name: CALLOUS
personality.desc: Insensitive and indifferent. Has no concern for the feelings of others.

personality.name: ANIMATED
personality.desc: Likes to express feelings with gestures.

personality.name: RESERVED
personality.desc: Keeps their emotions inside. Always appears calm & collected.

personality.name: COMPASSIONATE
personality.desc: Sensitive to the feelings & needs of others.

personality.name: CULTURED
personality.desc: Is learned in the ways of High Society and has refined tastes & sensibilities.

personality.name: BOORISH
personality.desc: Informal, simplistic, unrefined, even rude.

personality.name: DOMINANT
personality.desc: Possessive and controlling. They're only happy if they're in control.

personality.name: SUBMISSIVE
personality.desc: Prefers to defer control to a more dominant personality.

personality.name: ENIGMATIC
personality.desc: Secretive, unreadable, and mysterious. Nobody can read their poker face.

personality.name: LOYAL
personality.desc: Faithfully dedicated to people around them. their first priority is always their friends.

personality.name: TRECHEROUS
personality.desc: Duplicitous & disloyal, they will happily switch sides if it suits their purposes.

personality.name: OPPORTUNIST
personality.desc: Always on the lookout for something/someone to exploit. Good at turning situations to their advantage.

personality.name: OPTIMISTIC
personality.desc: Always expects the best from people, always hopes for the ideal outcome.

personality.name: PESSIMISTIC
personality.desc: Always expects the worst from everything and prepares for bad outcomes.

personality.name: SELFISH
personality.desc: Concerned exclusively with their own needs, desires, & goals.

personality.name: GENEROUS
personality.desc: Giving & selfless. Always ready with a helping hand or emotional support.

personality.name: SAVVY
personality.desc: Experienced & knowledgeable. Hard to trick.

personality.name: GULLIBLE
personality.desc: Easily misled by rhetoric or logical trickery.

personality.name: PATIENT
personality.desc: They never get frustrated while waiting, and are willing to bide their time until the ideal moment.

personality.name: IMPATIENT
personality.desc: Frustrated whenever they are forced to wait. Will always act immediately whenever possible.

personality.name: JOINER
personality.desc: Prefers to be a part of a group, and willing change themselves to fit it.

personality.name: PRACTICAL
personality.desc: Grounded and utilitarian. Focused on the present & reality. Concerned with exigency rather than desire.

personality.name: DEFIANT
personality.desc: Rebellious. Thrives when faced by social pressures or danger.

personality.name: PARTIER
personality.desc: Throws legendary parties. Can "Woo!" to amuse & excite a crowd. More likely to hook up at parties.

personality.name: SPOOKY
personality.desc: Fearful & Nervous. Easily startled and terrified. May have a collection of inane and/or absurd fears.

personality.name: OBJECTIVE
personality.desc: Unbiased. Able to distance themselves from a situation, adopting the perspective of an outsider.

personality.name: IMAGINATIVE
personality.desc: An inventive lateral thinker, they live "outside the box".

personality.name: CURIOUS
personality.desc: Compulsively investigate new & unknown things. Usually possess a strong sense of wonder & love of mystery.

personality.name: RELIANT
personality.desc: Dependable. Always ready when they're called for.

personality.name: GENTLE
personality.desc: Tender & kind. They have a light hand in matters physical and emotional.
